ack.p: We acknowledge the support from the CGIAR research program ‘‘Forests, Trees and Agroforestry” (CRP6) on technical aspects of the research. We would like to thank the Kala Budha Magar, Saraswati Rimal, Santosh Rana, and the Elam and the Coffee Promotion Program team, HELVETAS Nepal for providing crop plantation data, and Andrew Stevenson for English editing.
